Title: deploy-with-ease
Description: One-click deployment tool based on DrobBox files hosting
HomeWiki:
deploy-with-ease

The goal of this project is to provide an ability to easily deploy and keep updated the applications without distribution of standalone installers or hosting a web services. This tool primarily relies on the free file sharing services such as DropBox to store the data. It has a client which can be configured for specific application or a set of apps. Once the client is deployed on the user's PC it will allow the user to get the newest version of your app with one click. Also it provides an API that can be used within your app to track it's updates automatically.

It doesn't take your DropBox credentials and completely based on the usage of public links to the DropBox.

The client is fully customizable so your users won't even know that they use something called "deploy-with-ease" =)

The project in the initial stage and has no working version of the app yet.
